body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**: 4.8.0
- **Upscaler version**:
- **GUI version**: 2.8.1
- **CLI version**:

## Symptom

I tried all drivers and all of them couldn't run and left " returned non-zero exit status 4294967295 "
It seems that it could extract all frams but couldn't upscaled
I was using " video2x-4.8.0-win32-full.zip "
I searched by google and issues but I didn't find a way to solve this
And sorry I'm using windows10 Chinese version and my English is not so well

## Error Log or Screenshots
